Articles.Content:
Opening day for MLB is March 30, 2023. 
 

I dont understand the appeal of football. I really dont and I live in a state where football is taken obscenely seriously from HS to college and even the NFL…

224602122023
I live in Buffalo, NY so football is huge here. Although… the Bills were the only team to go 0-4 in consecutive super bowls. (1990-1993)
